Eks Aspri Istri Imam Nahrawi Dipanggil KPK di Kasus Suap KONI
01 Nov 2019, 10:28 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Penyidik KPK terus melakukan pemeriksaan terhadap saksi-saksi terkait kasus suap dana hibah KONI yang menjerat eks Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora) Imam Nahrawi. Kali ini, KPK memanggil Yuyun Sulistyawati yang pernah menjadi asisten pribadi istri Nahrawi, Shobibah Rohmah.
"Dipanggil sebagai saksi untuk tersangka IMR (Iman Nahrawi)," kata Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah kepada wartawan, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Dalam kasus ini, KPK sebelumnya sudah memeriksa istri Nahrawi, Shobibah Rohmah, pada Kamis (24/10). Lewat Shobibah itu, KPK menelusuri interaksi Imam dengan asistennya yang juga jadi tersangka, Miftahul Ulum.
"Jadi fokus kami saat ini adalah mendalami pengetahuan dari saksi terkait interaksi tersangka Ulum dengan Menpora pada saat itu, karena sejumlah dugaan penerimaan oleh Menpora tidak bisa dilepaskan dari peran tersangka Ulum," kata Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah di gedung KPK, Jalan Kuningan Persada, Jakarta Selatan, Kamis (24/10).
KPK menetapkan Imam Nahrawi sebagai tersangka kasus dugaan suap terkait hibah KONI. Dia diduga menerima total suap Rp 26,5 miliar.
"Dalam rentang 2014-2018, IMR selaku Menpora melalui MIU selaku asisten pribadi Menpora diduga telah menerima uang sejumlah Rp 14,7 miliar," kata Wakil Ketua Alexander Marwata di gedung KPK, Jalan Kuningan Persada, Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (18/9).
Imam turut diduga meminta Rp 11,8 miliar dalam rentang 2016-2018. Total dugaan penerimaan 26,5 miliar.
Uang itu diduga merupakan commitment fee atas pengurusan hibah yang diajukan pihak KONI kepada Kemenpora pada 2018. Penerimaan juga diduga terkait dengan Ketua Dewan Pengarah Satlak Prima dan penerimaan lain yang berhubungan dengan jabatan Imam.

(ibh/dhn)

Ex-Aspri Imam Nahrawi's Wife Called by the KPK in KONI Bribery Case
Nov 01 2019, 10:28 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - KPK investigators continue to examine witnesses related to the KONI grant bribery case that ensnared former Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora) Imam Nahrawi. This time, the KPK summoned Yuyun Sulistyawati who had been a personal assistant to Nahrawi's wife, Shobibah Rohmah.
"Called as a witness for the IMR (Iman Nahrawi) suspect," KPK Kabiro PR spokesman Febri Diansyah told reporters on Friday (1/11/2019).
In this case, the KPK had previously examined Nahrawi's wife, Shobibah Rohmah, on Thursday (10/24). Through the Shobibah, the KPK traced Imam's interaction with his assistant who was also a suspect, Miftahul Ulum.
"So our focus now is to deepen the knowledge of witnesses regarding the interaction of the Ulum suspect with the Menpora at the time, because a number of allegations of acceptance by the Menpora cannot be released from the role of the Ulum suspect," said KPK Public Relations Commissioner Febri Diansyah at the KPK building, Jalan Kuningan Persada, South Jakarta, Thursday (10/24).
The KPK named Imam Nahrawi a suspect in a suspected bribery case related to the KONI grant. He is suspected of receiving a bribe of Rp. 26.5 billion.
"In the 2014-2018 range, IMR as the Menpora through MIU as the personal assistant of the Menpora is alleged to have received a sum of Rp 14.7 billion," Deputy Chairman Alexander Marwata said at the KPK building, Jalan Kuningan Persada, South Jakarta, Wednesday (18/9) .
Imam also allegedly asked for Rp. 11.8 billion in the 2016-2018 range. The total alleged receipt is 26.5 billion.
The money was allegedly a commitment fee for the management of the grant submitted by KONI to the Ministry of Youth and Sport in 2018. The receipt was also allegedly related to the Chairperson of the Satlak Prima Steering Board and other receipts related to the Imam's position.
